| create
export function create(lang, code){
    code = code.replace(/</g, '<').replace(/>/g, '>')
    const codeHtml = `<pre class="copy-container" data-v="${lang}"><header><span class='code-title'>${lang}</span><i class="fa-light fa-clipboard copy-btn"></i></header><code class="language-${lang} copy-text">${code}</code></pre>`;
    $('.selectedEl').html(codeHtml, true);
    hljs.highlightElement($_('.selectedEl pre code'));
}
| reverse
export function reverse(self){
   self.processElements('pre',(pre)=>{
        if (!pre.attr('data-v')) return;
        if(pre.$('.code-title').text() !== pre.attr('data-v')){
            pre.attr('data-t',pre.$('.code-title').text())
        } 
        pre.update({
            html:pre.$('code').text().replace(/</g, '<').replace(/>/g, '>'),
            rclass:'copy-container'
        })       
   })
}
| render
export function render(self){
    self.processElements('pre',(pre)=>{
        if (!pre.attr('data-v')) return;
        const lang = pre.attr('data-v')
        const code_text = pre.html()
        const code_title = pre.attr('data-t') || lang
        const preHtml = `<header><span class='code-title'>${code_title}</span><i class="fa-light fa-clipboard copy-btn"></i></header><code class='language-${lang} copy-text'>${code_text}</code>`;
        pre.update({html:preHtml,class:'copy-container'})
        hljs.highlightElement(pre.$('code'));
    })
}

const tb_class = 'd-block scroll p-1 p-sm-2 mb-2 scroll scroll-both scroll-min scroll-on-hover'
const table_class = 'table mx-auto table-striped'

export function create(data = '1x1') {
    const [column_num, row_num] = data.split('x').map(n => Math.max(n, 1));
    const allth = Array.from({ length: column_num }, (_, i) => `<th scope='col'>head${i + 1}</th>`).join('');
    const alltd = Array.from({ length: column_num }, (_, i) => i === 0 
        ? `<th scope="row">col${i + 1}</th>` 
        : `<td>col${i + 1}</td>`).join('');
    const thead = `<thead class="table-border"><tr>${allth}</tr></thead>`;
    const tbody = `<tbody>${Array.from({ length: row_num }, () => `<tr>${alltd}</tr>`).join('')}</tbody>`;    
     $('.selectedEl').create('tb',{
        class:tb_class,
        html:`
        <table class="${table_class}">
        <caption>table caption</caption>            
        ${thead}${tbody}
        </table>
        `
     })
}
| reverse
export function reverse(self){
   self.processElements('tb',(tb)=>{
         const table = tb.$('table');
         const caption = table.$('caption')
         caption ? tb.attr('data-v',caption.text()) : null         
         const table_code = convertTableToMarkdown(table);
         tb.update({
            rclass:tb_class,
            html:`<pre>${table_code}</pre>`
         })
   })
}
function convertTableToMarkdown(tableEl) {
    let markdown = '';
    const rows = tableEl.$x('tr');

    rows.forEach((row, rowIndex) => {
        const cells = Array.from(row.$x('td, th'));
        const rowContent = cells.map(cell => `| ${cell.html().trim().replace(/\|/g, '|')} `).join('') + '|';
        markdown += rowContent + '\n';

        if (rowIndex === 0) {
            const separator = '| ' + cells.map(() => '--- ').join(' | ') + '|';
            markdown += separator + '\n';
        }
    });
    return markdown;
}
| render
export function render(self){
   self.processElements('tb',(tb)=>{
         const table_code = tb.$('pre')?.html()
         const md = window.markdownit({ html: true });
         const result = md.render(table_code);
         const caption_html = tb.attr('data-v') ? `<caption>${tb.attr('data-v')}</caption>` : '';
         tb.html(result)
         tb.update({
            class:tb_class,
            html:`
                <table class="${table_class}">
                    ${caption_html}            
                    ${tb.$('table').html()}
                </table>                 
                `
         })
   })
}

export function create(links){
    $('.selectedEl').create('im', {
        class: 'media mb-2',
        html: getImageHtml(links)
    });
}

export function getImageHtml(links) {
    const images = links.split(',');
    const visibleImages = images.slice(0,4);
    const hiddenImages = images.slice(3);
    const randomId = Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 8);

    const visibleHtml = visibleImages.map((img, idx) => {
        const [src, caption] = img.split('^^');
        const captionHtml = caption ? `<span class='figure-caption'>${caption}</span>` : '';
        if (images.length === 2 && idx === 1 || images.length <= 3 && idx === 0) {
            return `<div class="col-12"><img src="${src}" alt="Image${idx + 1}" class="img-fluid">${captionHtml}</div>`;
        }
        if (idx === 3 && hiddenImages.length > 0) {
            return `<div class="col-12 col-lg-6 position-relative">
                        <img src="${src}" alt="Image${idx + 1}" class="img-fluid">
                        ${captionHtml}
                        <div class="image-overlay hover-underline" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#clp-${randomId}">
                            see others +${hiddenImages.length}
                        </div>
                    </div>`;
        }
        return `<div class="col-12 col-lg-6 mb-1"><img src="${src}" alt="Image${idx + 1}" class="img-fluid"></div>`;
    }).join('');

    const collapseHtml = hiddenImages.length
        ? `<div class="row collapse mt-3" id="clp-${randomId}">
               ${hiddenImages.map((img, idx) => {
                   const [src, caption] = img.split('^^');
                   const captionHtml = caption ? `<span class='figure-caption'>${caption}</span>` : '';
                   return `<div class="col-12 mb-1"><img src="${src}" alt="Image${idx + 4}" class="img-fluid">${captionHtml}</div>`;
               }).join('')}
           </div>`
        : '';

    return `<div class="row">${visibleHtml}${collapseHtml}</div>`;
}
| reverse
export function reverse(self) {
    self.processElements('im', (im) => {
        const short_code = Array.from(im.$x('img')).map(img => {
            const caption = img.parentNode.$('.figure-caption');
            return caption ? `${img.src}^^${caption.text()}` : img.src;
        }).join(',');
        im.html(short_code);
        im.classList.remove('media', 'mb-2');
    });
}
| render
export function render(self){
   self.processElements('im',(im)=>{
       im.update({
        class:'media mb-2',
        html:getImageHtml(im.html())
       })
   })
}
